/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/DisplayImage.dir/DisplayImage.cpp.o  -o DisplayImage -rdynamic //lib64/libopencv_calib3d.so //lib64/libopencv_contrib.so //lib64/libopencv_core.so //lib64/libopencv_features2d.so //lib64/libopencv_flann.so //lib64/libopencv_highgui.so //lib64/libopencv_imgproc.so //lib64/libopencv_legacy.so //lib64/libopencv_ml.so //lib64/libopencv_objdetect.so //lib64/libopencv_photo.so //lib64/libopencv_stitching.so //lib64/libopencv_superres.so //lib64/libopencv_ts.so //lib64/libopencv_video.so //lib64/libopencv_videostab.so -Wl,-rpath,//lib64
